channel.title: ++++++ Project Sparkz PK. ++++++
channel.description:
[b][size=20pt]Sparkz PK Development Team[/size][/b]
[code]Leaders : - Sparkz - WH1T3 B0W[/code]
[b]We Are Going To be Working On A "PK" Server[/b] So Far The Server Is OK . [b]We Need Coders Capable Of Adding Specs , Shops (Mainly Basic Stuff)[/b] We Also Need Webdesigners For Forums Etc, [b]The Project So Far Has Its Own Client[/b] We Will Also Work On Improving This [code]Current Openings : Coders, - - - - - - - -
Web Designers : - - - - - - - - - -
Hosts : - Sparkz - - [/code] Other Jobs Available Also : Just Post Back / PM With Application Form : [code]Name: Age: Job: Experience (Needed): Proof:[/code]
So Far Our [b][u]"Client"[/u][/b] Looks Like : [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb288/stephensparkz/OMGjpg001.jpg[/img]
[b]So I Hope You Join Us Today :)[/b]
- Sparkz - WH1T3B0W :):):):):):):):)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 16 March 2009, 10:35:26[/size][hr]This Is now .. reopen.. i found my thread and ive decided im gonna go through with it.. after all this time.
